summary: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.
cast: Ciarán Hinds|Richard Donat|Sarah Polley|Ulrich Thomsen|Anders W. Berthelsen|Murdoch MacDonald|Joseph Rutten|John Walf|Katrin Cartlidge|Vinessa Shaw|Adam Curry|Catherine McCormack|Sean Penn|Josh Lucas|Elizabeth Hurley|John Maclaren|Rita Kvist|Jan Tore Kristoffersen|Catherine Kellner|Karl Júlíusson|Peter Cobbold|R.D. Call|Richard Scobie|Michele Maillet
title: El peso del agua
